growthexperiments-help-panel-home-title: Nyami sɔŋsim zaŋ chaŋ maliniŋ polo
growthexperiments-help-panel-suggesteded: N-zaŋdi sodolisi pahiri nyɛla din yɛn soŋ ka niriba bɔhindi yɔmyɔm.
{{GENDER:$1|nyini}} Zang yellow shenga ban Karinda ni bora
Di baŋsim gahindili zaŋ chaŋ lahabali ŋɔ  bi kpa ni a mali ka naanyi tooi tum tuuni ŋɔ.
So shɛŋa din pun buɣisi doya maa nyɛla maʒini nama , di ni tooi pa nyelimaŋli.
Ti zaa ni tooi nti bachinim sooya din bɛ boori ba,bɛ nti sooya din be tuhi lahabaya. Zaŋmi{{GENDER:$1|a}}zambu n baŋ di niŋ ka di yɛ deede bɛ di Pa deede
[[$1|Bohimma viɛnyɛla zaŋ chaŋ maʒini ni tiri buɣisiri shɛŋa polo]]

*Tim sooya din hankali ni chɛ ka ŋun karim di ni boori ni baham pam zaŋ chaŋ di pallo.
*Tihi tabli ni sooli maa nyɛla din ni ʒiya lahabali maa shee.
*Di ti bachi yɛri,yuuma,ni dabsa kalbu sooya
*Di yi niŋ {{GENDER:$1|ka a}} bi dihi tabli, kpahi yaɣi.
